reports_summary: Community testing shows Assassin's Creed Revelations feels smooth on the Steam Deck OLED when run with balanced settings; using a 45 FPS cap and modest GPU tuning keeps frame pacing steady and tames spikes. The available report rated performance highly and described consistent behaviour with few stability issues, and battery life is strong for a handheld — roughly five hours at about 10 W draw — so sessions last without aggressive power drain. If you need extra headroom, trimming a couple of heavy effects rather than resolution is the common approach.
